channel.title: CVE Feed for amaa -- ACF On-The-Go
channel.description: The latest CVEs for amaa -- ACF On-The-Go

item.title: CVE-2024-3071|2024-05-02T16:52:02.038Z -- amaa -- ACF On-The-Go
item.description: The ACF On-The-Go plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the acfg_update_fields() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update arbitrary post titles, descriptions, and ACF values.
